About This Property
*RENTAL ALTERNATIVES AVAILABLE**

Gut renovated Brookline Village 4 Bed/2 Bath on 2nd floor. Open living room/kitchen, stainless steel/granite kitchen with dishwasher and microwave, 2 full bathrooms, central A/C, laundry in unit, recessed lights, hardwood floors, deck/balcony off of living room. Parking is not available at the building. Heat (gas), hot water (gas), electric, water and sewer paid by tenants. Students welcome. Lease runs 9/1/2021 through 8/29/2022. 1st, last, 1 month security and $50 key fee applies. Broker fee equal to 1 months rent due from client and is to be split between listing and renting agent.

If the price isn’t right or you don’t love the location, reach out to me anyways as I have many available units that will better suit your preferences.?
